id.description: A unique identifier for the prompt template.

name.description: A human-readable name for the prompt template.

description.description: A detailed explanation of the prompt template's purpose and usage.

system.description: An optional system prompt segment that sets overall context or instructions for the LLM.

template.description: The actual prompt template string, potentially containing variable placeholders.

template_format.description: Specifies the templating language used in the template.

output_parser.description: Defines how the output of the LLM should be parsed.

name.description: The name of the output parser (e.g., 'JSON', 'Regex', 'List').

arguments.description: Configuration parameters specific to the chosen output parser.

prompt_chain.description: An array of IDs that refer to other prompt templates for prompt chaining.

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata associated with the prompt template. Custom properties can be added here.

tags.description: An array of tags for categorizing and searching prompt templates.

input_variables.description: Array of input variable definitions required by the template.

name.description: The name of the input variable (must match placeholders in the template).

type.description: The data type of the input variable.

description.description: Description of the input variable and its purpose.

default.description: A default value for the input variable, must be consistent with the specified type.

required.description: Specifies if the input variable is required for the prompt to function correctly.

examples.description: An array of example inputs and expected outputs for few-shot learning and testing.

input.description: A key-value map of input variable names and their corresponding values.

output.description: The expected output from the LLM for the given input.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the prompt template was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the prompt template was last updated.

version.description: An integer representing the version of the prompt template.
